Name: Amend section 17 of LL 15 of 2006, relating to the reporting of lobbyist activities and the enforcement of the lobbying law, in relation to the effective date of LL 15.
Title: A Local Law to amend section seventeen of local law number fifteen for the year two thousand six, relating to the reporting of lobbyist activities and the enforcement of the lobbying law, in relation to the effective date of local law number fifteen.

History.Action: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
History.Description: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
A motion was made that this Introduction be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Governmental Operations
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
History.AgendaNote: Preconsidered - Coupled on GO with Message of Necessity

History.Description: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Mayor
This Introduction was Signed Into Law by Mayor
This Introduction was Recved from Mayor by Council

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1.  Section 17 of local law number 15 for the year 2006 is amended to read as follows:
§17.  This local law shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after its enactment, provided, however, that [sections three, nine,] section eleven[, thirteen and fourteen] of this local law shall take effect one year after the enactment of this local law, and provided, further, that any reports required to be filed for calendar year 2006 pursuant to subchapter 2 of chapter 2 of title 3 of the administrative code of the city of New York, including reports required to be filed by January 15, 2007, shall be filed with the city clerk either in person or by mail, and provided, further, that any statement of registration filed for calendar year 2007, shall be filed by electronic transmission in a standard format as required by the City Clerk, and provided, further, that[,] upon enactment of this local law, the relevant city agencies shall take all necessary steps, including but not limited to the promulgation of forms and rules, to ensure the prompt implementation of this local law upon its effective date.
§2.	This local law shall take effect immediately and shall be retroactive to, and deemed to have been in full force and effect on and after, December 10, 2006.
